column2: Attack a troll realm preemptively to break it apart and execute its leader. §Y[stromic.GetName]§! and §Y[arathi.GetName]§! rulers can use this Casus Belli against all types of troll rulers, while §Y[high_elven.GetName]§!, §Y[blood_elven.GetName]§! and §Y[wretched.GetName]§! rulers only against Forest Trolls.
§YTrolls§! in the realm and in the region will be angered.
